QCAlgorithm provides a shortcut method for each indicator available. Each method creates an indicator object, hooks it up for automatic updates, and returns it to be used in your algorithm.

You can determine the specific requirements of the indicator from the reference table below.

\n
\n \n
\n

RC()1/1

\n 
\n            RegressionChannel QuantConnect.Algorithm.QCAlgorithm.RC (
\n    Symbol                      symbol,
\n    Int32                       period,
\n    Decimal                     k,
\n    Nullable<Resolution>  resolution,
\n    Func<Decimal>         selector
\n   )
\n
\n
\n \n
\n

Creates a new RegressionChannel indicator which will compute the LinearRegression, UpperChannel and LowerChannel lines, the intercept and slope

\n
\n \n
\n \n
\n \n
\n \n
\n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n
Parameters
SymbolsymbolThe symbol whose RegressionChannel we seek.
Int32periodThe period of the standard deviation and least square moving average (linear regression line).
DecimalkThe number of standard deviations specifying the distance between the linear regression and upper or lower channel lines.
Nullable<Resolution>resolutionThe resolution.
Func<Decimal>selectorSelects a value from the BaseData to send into the indicator, if None defaults to the Value property of BaseData (x => x.Value).
\n
\n \n
\n

Return

\n

RegressionChannel - A Regression Channel configured with the specified period and number of standard deviation

\n
\n \n
\n

Definition at line 1547 of file Algorithm/QCAlgorithm.Indicators.cs.

\n
\n \n
\n \n

The indicator resolution can be different from the resolution of your securities data. However, the resolution of the indicator should be equal to or higher than the resolution of your security. In most cases, this usage should be in the Initialize method. If you call this method several times, it will create a new indicator that is not ready to use.

To retrieve the numerical value of any indicator, you can use the Current.Value attribute of the indicator.

private RegressionChannel _rc;
// In Initialize()
_rc = RC(symbol, period, k);

// In OnData()
if (_rc.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _rc.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
self.rc = self.RC(symbol, period, k)

# In OnData()
if self.rc.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.rc.Current.Value
